content.para:
This project was carried out as an integrated proposal for the Cuban National Library. It was a volunteer project. The core challenge was to provide an integrated solution, since the portal had a lack of commonality in the different pages and subpages.

I developed the interaction and graphic design concepts. I put a main focus on intuitive navigation and search, through the different collections. The main proposal was to provide a set of different filtering operations combined with navigation. But to retrieve related content with metadata.The styles and graphics have been partially implemented

content.head1: Documentation with 3D models for the web | 2017
content.para:
This is a threedimensional infographic to share the novelties of this new 3D printer design

Optima is android app. It was developed in the Cuban Neuroscience Center to assist National healthcare systems in the screening of learning disorders.This includes Dyslexia, hearing problems, learning diseases and their possible causes.

My role was to analyze the task flows and design an App that captures the activity structure. It includes navigation through databases of registered child's, introducing new child's in the system, coordination with the monitoring web application, as well as selection and running of tests.
